message: Good ${timeOfDay}, ${firstName}. Thank you for booking a stay at ${company} in ${city}. We will send you a message when Room ${roomNumber} is all ready for you to enjoy. In the meantime, please don't hesitate to reach out with any questions or concerns.
Good ${timeOfDay}, ${firstName}. Room ${roomNumber} here at ${company} is all ready for you. Please let us know if you need anything.

Hello, ${name}. Again, welcome to ${hotelName}. We hope check-in went smoothly for you this ${timeOfDay} Please let us know if you have any questions about ${city} or if Room ${roomNumber} requires any attention.
